=====================
Translation dashboard
=====================

PsyNet is available in 40 languages:
------------------------------------
.. list-table::
   :header-rows: 1
   :widths: 15 15 15 55

   * - Language
     - Percent translated
     - Percent verified
     - Translator
   * - Arabic (``ar``)
     - 100.0 %
     - 0.0 %
     - GoogleTranslate API
